MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G33 & G69 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:28am following reports of a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:30am on the 12th of March 2021.
